name: Retro Brawling
description:
Retro Brawling! 👾

(Still looking for a good name for the game, I would like to see your ideas in the comments 😉)

The idea of the game is simple, you meet with some friends on a boring afternoon, take some snacks, and fight in the most retro way until there is nothing left to eat 🎮🍕

// DEVELOPING VERSION
// THERE ARE A LOT OF THINGS TO DO AND FIX
